name: Lost Woods (SadeghAfshari)
description:
LOST WOODS is a horror-FPS story-based experience that's about a man who's trying to find his family in the middle of a dark and mysterious forest. 



STORY:
The train has not returned yet. Daniel is very anxious and worried. What could have happened to it? Is it because a large part of the train route passes through a forest that people call the "Cursed Forest"? No... Daniel did not believe the nonsense people were saying. He was only worried about his wife and child. Until...

GAMEPLAY:

LOST WOODS is a first-person/shooter/horror game. There is not much shooting element in the game and you have an old gun with a small number of bullets to defend yourself with it. Sometimes you may have to sneak through zombies to save your bullets...

STORYTELLING:

The story is an important part of the game. Most of it is narrated through the monologues that Daniel has with himself, or the strange voices that whisper in his ear.

CREADITS:

Created & Directed by: Sadegh Afshari
Voice Acting: Ehsan Farrokh
Dialogue Effects & Processing:  Arman Jangmiri
